title: This K-Beauty Brand Just Dropped the Dopest Marvel Makeup Set
text: NEED. Pop culture beauty mash-ups are old hat at this point, but leave it to K-beauty brand The Face Shop to knock its Marvel collaboration out of the park. The cult beauty brand put together a smorgasbord of superhero designs for everything from mascara to eyeliner to nail polish. Did you ever think you'd be in the market for Spider-Man lipstick? Now's your chance: The collection primarily centers on Captain America (via his shield), Iron Man, and Spidey, but other shots of the collection show other familiar Avenging faces: Alas, The Face Shop operates primarily in Asia which means that getting your hands on the collection is an uphill battle. But here are two places to start. Follow Lilian on Twitter. FYI, Your Eyes Need A Hydrating Eye Cream (!!)
